channel.title: Posts on Maxime NEMO - Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Maxime NEMO - Portfolio

item.title: Challenge DATA & IA by Ens'IA and Neovision
item.description: The challenge: This challenge is about the well known subject of Optical Character Recognition (OCR). The goal is quite simple : building the best model to recognize the characters in the dataset given by Neovision. (private dataset) The results: My team managed to end in second position with a macro-averaged accuracy of 0.78. The model: My model is available in my github (french version). We tried different methods. We worked on transfer learning, on image preprocessing, on segmentation, etc…

item.title: Jpeg decoder
item.description: This project is about building a functional JPEG to PPM decoder. We worked together with two teammates to build this using the C language. This program can process multiple JPEG images in baseline sequential mode (non progressive). Because I am not the only one owner of this code, I will not publish it. However, you can contact me to access the code.
